conbody.p:
Datasets dedicated to the search function contain the list of attributes to display in the search output table. Each attribute becomes a possible column in the table.
Translation entered on dataset attribute becomes the column header label.

These datasets must respect certain design rules:
Dataset must be based on the entity to be searched. For instance, dataset based on entity Instrument can be used in the instrument search only.
No association can be mapped, only attributes.
No calculated attribute can be mapped.

Several datasets for search output can be created on the same based entity. For instance, you can specialize the search output on instrument nature by creating several datasets, one by nature or group of nature.
